description: Creates a worker configuration using the specified properties.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the worker configuration.

parameters.name: propertiesFileContent
parameters.description: Base64 encoded contents of connect-distributed.properties file.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags you want to attach to the worker configuration. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the worker configuration was created.

nested_items.name: latestRevision
nested_items.description: The latest revision of the worker configuration.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time that a worker configuration revision was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of a worker configuration revision.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of a worker configuration.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the worker configuration.

nested_items.name: workerConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that Amazon assigned to the worker configuration.

nested_items.name: workerConfigurationState
nested_items.description: The state of the worker configuration.
